text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Your imaginary tax cut did nothing for 99% of the country with an income. Social Security is starvation and homelessness. If 40+ million aren't  working because of layoff from Covid-19 there is no income. Trump has caused all our difficulties by his ignorance and arrogance.
